Fault.name: BPEL/FraudCheck.bpel
Fault.fix: Remove the correlation property "ns2:Property1" from the set "CorrSet" or re-define the propertyAlias "<message {http://xmlns.oracle.com/LoanOriginationApp/FraudCheckPrj/FraudCheck}FraudCheckRequestMessage>" to associate to "<message {http://xmlns.oracle.com/LoanOriginationApp/FraudCheckPrj/FraudCheck}FraudCheckResponseMessage>".
Fault.msg: Correlation set "CorrSet" cannot be used in this "bpel:correlation" because property "ns2:Property1" of this set is NOT associated with "<message {http://xmlns.oracle.com/LoanOriginationApp/FraudCheckPrj/FraudCheck}FraudCheckResponseMessage>" (currently associates to "<message {http://xmlns.oracle.com/LoanOriginationApp/FraudCheckPrj/FraudCheck}FraudCheckRequestMessage>").
